title: After Dark (18+)
description: Spicy, flirty, and dangerous. strictly for adults. No phones, just physical risks and raw honesty.

cards.content: Truth: What is your absolute favorite sexual position?
cards.back: Dare: Demonstrate a sexual position using a chair (or the floor) solo.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room receives the most looks from you?
cards.back: Dare: Sit on the lap of the person to your right for the next two rounds.

cards.content: Truth: What is the strangest place you have ever had sex?
